评论详情: I ordered this necklace for my preteen daughter. She loves the double necklace look, and this one makes it easy with only one clasp. The necklace is well made and priced reasonably.

This necklace is just as pictured. It seems pretty durable, and I like the two lengths of the chains. An odd thing is that the clasp is on the left side. If this bothers you, it looks like it would be pretty easy to detatch the main charm, turn it around, and put it back on.
